name: BEFORE THE SUNRISE
description:
Suffering from malfunctioning body mods, you find yourself discarded on the lowest part of the city - vyper's hole. Your time is limited. Your only way out is up, through the grimy mining district, the flashing markets where reality and dreams collide and the shining buildings of edge point.

Give yourself over to the beat and feel the rhythm.

Climb your way to the top of the city using your cybernetically enhanced jumps too see the true sunrise. Maybe for the last time?

A game made in 48h for #beansjam 2022.

Art by Lisa Marie Barth https://lisamariebarth.com/

Coding by Keno Rott https://twitter.com/iamVaultKid

Music and Sound by Viktor Kraus https://twitter.com/ViktorKraus2
